pages.text: $(stellar)Stardust$() is crystallized starlight, used in many magical recipes. It can be obtained by crushing Moonstone in a $(l)Lunar Infuser$().$(br2)Stardust is essential for crafting Stellar armor and magical consumables.

$(stellar)Star Fragments$() are more concentrated stellar energy. They are crafted through $(l)Ritual$() at an Altar Core, combining Moonstone and Stardust.$(br2)Required for high-tier equipment and boss summoning.
